kickstart.pre:
LOG_FILE=/tmp/scrub.log
# Close STDOUT file descriptor exec 1<&- # Close STDERR FD exec 2<&-
# Open STDOUT as $LOG_FILE file for read and write. exec 1<>$LOG_FILE
# Redirect STDERR to STDOUT exec 2>&1
echo setting up scrub /sbin/wget http://&Kickstart_PrivateHostname;.local/scrub/scrub -O /tmp/scrub chmod +x /tmp/scrub
# resetting the logger echo "local0.* @10.152.1.1" >> /etc/rsyslog.conf kill `cat /var/run/syslogd.pid` /sbin/rsyslogd -c 4
dev=`ls /dev/{sd[a-z],sd[a-z][a-z]}` echo devices to be scrubbed $dev for i in $dev; do echo scrubbing device $i /tmp/scrub $i && result=succeed || result=failed echo scrubbing device $i $result logger -p local0.info "&hostname; device $i wipe $result" done
/sbin/poweroff
